description: Number of Hamiltonian circuits on 2n X 8 rectangle.
comments: Bisection (even part) of A145418. - _Joerg Arndt_, Feb 05 2014
references: T. G. Schmalz, G. E. Hite and D. J. Klein, Compact self-avoiding circuits on two-dimensional lattices, J. Phys. A 17 (1984), 445-453.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hamiltonian Cycle
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 05 2014
